EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 3 - Why does Op
EmailTemplate.subject: Why does OpenStack makes sense for the global banking industry?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> OpenStack private cloud – the right solution for the banking industry Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Does a private cloud make sense? That’s the question many large enterprises are asking. For the banking industry, the answer to that question is definitely - yes!
Read our case study, “Centuries Young Bank readies for another century of progress”, for details on how an OpenStack private cloud met the challenges of the banking industry and changed the game for this large multinational bank. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
